comment.shortText: Fetch and load an image for programatic use such as in a `<canvas>` element.

comment.text: The `HtmlImageElement` or image url to load

mdx.rawBody: The `HtmlImageElement` or image url to load

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The `HtmlImageElement` or image url to load

markdownRemark.html:
The crossorigin attribute to set

const { image, error } = useImage('/static/kittens.png')
const ref = useRef<HTMLCanvasElement>()

useEffect(() => {
  const ctx = ref.current.getContext('2d')

  if (image) {
    ctx.drawImage(image, 0, 0)
  }
}, [ref, image])

return (
  <>
    {error && "there was a problem loading the image"}
    <canvas ref={ref} />
  </>

mdx.rawBody: Fetch and load an image for programatic use such as in a `<canvas>` element.
